availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Parker (Brown County, Ohio, moulder and laborer)

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, moulder and laborer. Alabama native. Married to Maranda Parker. Father of John P. Parker, H. G. Parker, Charles C. Parker, Horatio W. Parker, Hortenth Parker. Laborer in Brown County in 1850. Moulder in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, District No. 12 Ripley Township, p. 86.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 421.
